casebody.data:
APPLIED MONROE LENDER, LLC, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
CITY OF HOBOKEN PLANNING BOARD and City of Hoboken, Defendants-Respondents. C-972 September Term 2017
081018 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 27, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003048-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
